trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the class that defines the type that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯型別的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ComboBox".
trans-unit.target: 包含 "ComboBox" 的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, this method returns a reference to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />; otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="pattern" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 目前執行個體的參考，否則這個方法會對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> 呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將鍵盤輸入焦點設定在與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> 物件相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 控制項上。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> 控制項與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> 物件相關聯，無法接收焦點。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState" /> for the current element.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState" />。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果該值是唯讀的則為 <see langword="true" />，如果該值可修改則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The string value of a control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的字串值。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的字串值。
